name: improbability
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of not being likely to happen or be true, or something that is not likely to happen or be true: a statistical/mathematical improbabilityimprobability of I had to laugh at the improbability of the situation. See
improbable
More examplesFewer examplesThat the town had escaped the wildfire still seemed an improbability.He was amused at the improbability of becoming a minor celebrity.There are some holes in the plot of the film and a few improbabilities.
